name: The Recovery Center VR
description: *More updates on the way like adjustable height (Still in prototyping) and a better UI system *The recovery center is an in-development VR game originally made for the sync VR jam. It currently has 2 hard exercises and 1 easy one. Push-Ups Works your chest, shoulders, and triceps. Sit-ups work your core, and the stretch is a nice way to slowly warm up and just stretch as far as you can. The Idea for the UI currently is it is a clean white, like a doctor's office.
